text: Today’s beginner dialogue teaches some vital sentences to use when shopping (买东西).太…了(le) is a very useful construct. 太贵了 means “too expensive”, while 太矮了 means “too short”.Simply place an adjective between 太 and 了.小明：您好，我要买手表，这个多少钱？服务员：500元。小明：这个手表太贵了，有便宜点儿的吗？服务员：您看这个黑色的，200元。小明：还有其他颜色吗？服务员：红色。小明：那我买这个红色的手表吧。小明：Hello, I want to buy a watch. How much money is this?Shop assistant：500 yuan.小明：This watch is too expensive, do you have anything cheaper?Shop assistant：This black watch is 200 yuan.小明：Does it come in other colors?Shop assistant：Red.小明：Then I will buy this red watch.1 – 小明要买什么？a. 足球b. 地图c. 篮球d. 手表2 – 小明买什么颜色的手表？a. 红色b. 黑色c. 蓝色d. 绿色1. d2. aReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
